original_text: ‘Say to the Israelites, “You must keep my Sabbath days as special days. This will help you and your descendants to remember that you belong to me. You will remember that I, the Lord, have chosen you to be my people.
korean_text: 너는 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르기를 너희는 나의 안식일을 지키라 이는 나와 너희 사이에 너희 대대의 표징이니 나는 너희를 거룩하게 하는 여호와인 줄 너희가 알게 함이라

sentences.original_text: You must keep my Sabbath days
This will help you and your descendants
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 너와 너의 자손들을 도울 것이다

sentences.original_text: to remember that you belong to me
You will remember that I, the Lord
have chosen you to be my people
